coffees.name: Gran Espresso
coffees.description: Light and flavorful blend with cocoa and black pepper for an intense experience.

coffees.name: Planalto
coffees.description: Brazilian dark roast with rich and velvety body, and hints of fruits and nuts.

coffees.name: Piccollo
coffees.description: Mild and smooth blend featuring notes of toasted almond and dried cherry.

coffees.name: Danche
coffees.description: Ethiopian hand-harvested blend densely packed with vibrant fruit notes.

whyReasons.title: Best quality
whyReasons.description: Discover an endless variety of the world’s best artisan coffee from each of our roasters.

whyReasons.title: Exclusive benefits
whyReasons.description: Special offers and swag when you subscribe, including 30% off your first shipment.

whyReasons.title: Free shipping
whyReasons.description: We cover the cost and coffee is delivered fast. Peak freshness: guaranteed.

howItWorks.title: Pick your coffee
howItWorks.description: Select from our evolving range of artisan coffees. Our beans are ethically sourced and we pay fair prices for them. There are new coffees in all profiles every month for you to try out.

howItWorks.title: Choose the frequency
howItWorks.description: Customize your order frequency, quantity, even your roast style and grind type. Pause, skip or cancel your subscription with no commitment through our online portal.

howItWorks.title: Receive and enjoy
howItWorks.description: We ship your package within 48 hours, freshly roasted. Sit back and enjoy award-winning world-class coffees curated to provide a distinct tasting experience.

accordion.title: How do you drink your coffee?

cardOne.name: Capsule
cardOne.description: Compatible with Nespresso systems and similar brewers

cardTwo.name: Filter
cardTwo.description: For pour over or drip methods like Aeropress, Chemex, and V60

cardThree.name: Expresso
cardThree.description: Dense and finely ground beans for an intense, flavorful experience

cardOne.name: Single Origin
cardOne.description: Distinct, high quality coffee from a specific family-owned farm

cardTwo.name: Decaf
cardTwo.description: Just like regular coffee, except the caffeine has been removed

cardThree.name: Blended
cardThree.description: Combination of two or three dark roasted beans of organic coffees

cardOne.name: 250g
cardOne.description: Perfect for the solo drinker. Yields about 12 delicious cups.

cardTwo.name: 500g
cardTwo.description: Perfect option for a couple. Yields about 40 delectable cups.

cardThree.name: 1000g
cardThree.description: Perfect for offices and events. Yields about 90 delightful cups.

cardOne.name: Wholebean
cardOne.description: Best choice if you cherish the full sensory experience

cardTwo.name: Filter
cardTwo.description: For drip or pour-over coffee methods such as V60 or Aeropress

cardThree.name: Cafetiére
cardThree.description: Course ground beans specially suited for french press coffee

cardOne.name: Every week
cardOne.description: $7.20 per shipment. Includes free first-class shipping.

cardTwo.name: Every 2 weeks
cardTwo.description: $9.60 per shipment. Includes free priority shipping.

cardThree.name: Every month
